transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Ji ma'am.

Executive: Haanji sir, good morning sir.

Customer: Ji ji ma'am, good morning.

Executive: Haanji sir, maine aapko jo buylead whatsapp pe share kari hai, uska kya matlab revert hai, mere ko ek baar batayenge sir?

Customer: Ma'am, ek kingpin set hai, woh toh bilkul alag item hai.

Executive: Kaunsa wala jo screenshot bheja woh ya phir woh jo maine link share kiya tha woh wala?

Customer: Link share kiya tha woh.

Executive: Item hi alag hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Kingpin set jo hai woh alag item hota hai kya?

Customer: Woh truck ka item hai.

Executive: Achha, aur jo main screenshot bheji woh? Ek toh maine trailer air suspension ka bheja.

Customer: Mere product se related hai lekin us item mein deal nahi karta hu main.

Executive: Product se related hai but usme deal nahi karte hain.

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Refund karwa dijiye na, mere ko utne aise requirement hi nahi hai mere ko lead ki.

Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?

Customer: Madam ne kal kaha na woh refund karwa degi mere ko.

Executive: Woh cheez toh hai sir, dekho refund mein ek toh process bahut bada hoga us cheez mein refund mein, kyunki abhi mera jo hai last month bhi jo hai ek client ka refund hua hai but unhone kya tha dusre STX pe karwana tha GST ka kuch issue tha. Toh unhone unka refund kam se kam ek mahina lag gaya tha sir. Toh refund mein bahut bada process hota hai.

Customer: Nahi, jo bhi hota hai woh toh milega mere ko, kariye na, woh toh main abhi complaint kar deta hu, jo bhi process hoga fast kaam ho jayega phir aapka, apne aap aap call karoge mere ko.

Executive: Nahi, unhone unhone unhone bhi jo hai complaint karke hi refund karwaya tha toh usme process mein jitna time lagega woh lagega woh baat alag hai but sir aap khud bhi sochiye aapne investment kari hai, aapne business ke liye investment kari hogi na sir?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haanji, toh aap ek thoda sa.

Customer: Madam, yeh toh aapke baar baar aapne phone kiya tha woh cheez kiya tha mera business toh already achha chal raha hai, maine kaha chalo aap itna keh rahe ho toh main dekh leta hu aur kitna milta hai business. Already achha chal raha tha matlab aap keh rahe ho ab time ab time bhi isme lagta hai aap keh rahe ho yeh bhi check karo woh bhi check karo utna time bhi lagta hai uske aage koi customer nahi mile, paisa bhi maine lagaya.

Executive: Jo sir aapke paas jo direct inquiries aur calls aa rahi hai woh galat aa rahi hai kya mere ko yeh bataiye?

Customer: Ma'am, call toh aayi, aakhri baar call kab aayi mere paas mein?

Executive: Aakhri baar call aapke paas October mein aayi hai sir toh.

Customer: Refund wali baat karo ma'am, refund wali baat karo aap toh.

Executive: Sir, refund mein ek baat bataiye, refund mein aapko koi profit hoga ya hamara koi profit hoga?

Customer: Paise milenge na, 86500 kam thodi na hote mere.

Executive: Sir, woh cheez toh hai but aap khud sochiye sir aap businessman hai IndiaMART ke saath.

Customer: Mere ko business plan chahiye nahi, mere ko refund hi chahiye bas, refund ki baat kariye.

Executive: Sir, aap thoda sa maine aapko kya bola tha humne aapse teen mahine ka time liya tha aur aapko abhi ek mahina bhi nahi hua hai sir aap aur refund ki baat kar rahe hain, aap khud sochiye na sir.

Customer: Madam, aapne woh yeh bhi likh ke diya tha 100% buyleads consume karni hai, toh dedo mere ko woh kar lunga main.

Executive: Haan toh woh woh cheez hai hum aapko hum aapko uske liye nahi bol rahe ki aap buylead nahi consume kar rahe toh hum aapka refund nahi karenge woh cheez hume bhi pata dikh rahi hai sir ki buyleads available nahi hai.

Customer: Woh kuch bhi baatein aap kar rahe ho, aap yeh toh ab batao refund ke baare mein, main wapis email karta hu, jo bhi hai woh apne aap process hoga.

Executive: Woh cheez woh jo sir refund wali cheez woh aapki theek hai aap mail kar denge kar denge woh hamare paas hi aayega mail bhi.

Customer: Haan toh toh thoda kaam toh fast hoga na mera, jawab toh aapko dena padega.

Executive: Jawab toh sir main aapse baat kar rahi hu na sir us cheez ke regarding aap thoda sa time toh de dijiye sir please.

Customer: Madam, mere ko refund chahiye only refund.

Executive: Thoda sa business ke baare mein bhi toh sochiye sir aapke paas inquiries start toh aa rahi hai.

Customer: Madam, main wohi baat kar raha hu, madam ne mujhe bol diya refund ho jayega toh ab wapis aap wohi cheez behes chal rahi hai wapis.

Executive: Sir, woh cheez aapki baat dekho theek hai, refund jayega paisa aapke paas aa jayega par usse aapko profit kya hoga yeh bataiye, business aapko mil jayega usse?

Customer: Madam, mera time waste nahi hoga na jo time waste ho raha hai daily baat karne mein ho raha hai, uske baad main check karu usme.

Executive: Baat aapse kar rahe hain kyunki aapka concern hai sir isliye aapse baat kar rahe hain warna aapko bhi pata hume bhi pata aap businessman hai sir aapke paas bhi itna time nahi hota ki aap daily basis pe same hi cheez discuss karenge.

Customer: Haan, bilkul. But wohi hai ki bhai aapko aapka concern hai aapke buyleads ka issue hai is wajah se hum aap daily aapko daily basis pe follow up pe le rahe hain. Ab aap khud sochiye aapne paise de diye aur hum aapko calls na karte toh aap yeh cheez bhi toh bolte na ki paise le liye uske baad kuch response nahi de rahe.

Customer: Main wohi cheez baat kar raha hu, refund kare, ho jayega nahi ho jayega woh bataiye madam.

Executive: Refund ho jayega sir par hume thoda time toh dijiye ek baar thoda business kya pata ki bhai thode time mein business mil jaye sir.

Customer: Mere ko business chahiye hi nahi madam, mere ko business chahiye hi nahi, refund chahiye.

Executive: Aapne paise aapne paise kis liye lagaye sir, business ke liye lagaye honge na sir?

Customer: Ji madam.

Executive: Aapko yeh toh hai nahi IndiaMART pe kabhi bhi kuch bhi business nahi mila hoga.

Customer: Hai lekin jitna aap guarantee dete ho na plan lene se pehle hum aapko yeh denge woh denge woh denge woh kuch nahi mila.

Executive: Toh wohi wohi toh cheez dekho aapke liye maine concern raise kiya hai internal ticket bhi raise kari hai woh piche backend work kar rahi hai thoda toh time de dijiye sir unse unse revert aayega hume lagega ki bhai business nahi ho sakta hai toh hum aapko batayenge.

Customer: Aap jab maine aapke liye ticket raise kiya tha matlab jo maine uska toh ek din mein aapne solve kar diya woh aur jab aapne andar kiya woh internal usme abhi teen chaar din mein abhi tak jawab nahi aaya.

Executive: Sir, abhi jo baat jo maine mail daali thi woh maine teams ko daali thi, theek hai? Ab backend team jo jo proper profile pe work karti hai maine unko mail dal rakha hai. Toh woh algorithm based pe proper check karegi.

Customer: Main aapko process se email karunga aap bataiye dekho main aapko call karta hu email karta hu toh aapka hi phone aa jata hai aage se.

Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?

Customer: Madam, mere ko refund hi chahiye, mere ko business nahi chahiye, mere ko refund hi chahiye bas.

Executive: Please thoda sa toh time de dijiye, thoda sa time de dijiye nahi ho payega toh hum khud hi refund ke liye bol denge kyunki humne return mein likh ke de rakha hai yeh toh hai nahi hum aapko refund ke liye mana karenge. Yeh humne return mein likh ke de rakha hai toh hum yeh cheez mana nahi kar sakte.

Customer: Kal jo baat ho gayi na refund ke liye Ashima madam se baat ho gayi toh phir aap yeh discuss ho rahi hai ki hum aapko.

Executive: Sir, Ashima ma'am se aapki baat hui hai woh baat theek hai but aap khud bhi sochiye na sir refund refund jo hai meri isse jayega na, mere taraf se jayega na refund toh. Woh toh mere manager hai unhone bol diya refund ke liye but unhone yeh bhi bola hai ki bhai aapko kaafi samjhaya bhi ki thoda time de dijiye but aap maan nahi rahe hain main main aapse request kar raha hu sir thoda sa toh time de dijiye please sir.

Customer: Madam, kitna time chahiye aapko, aap email kar dijiye aapko time chahiye, tab mere ko customer milenge nahi milenge toh mere ko wapis pura paisa usi din chahiye phir woh koi yeh nahi hona chahiye 15 din lagenge 20 din lagenge.

Executive: Theek hai main sir ek baar discuss karke please main aapse request karungi thoda sa time dijiye main aapki cheez situation bhi samajh rahi hu ki bhai aapko paisa lagaya aapko nahi mil raha hai same wohi response mil raha hai.

Customer: Bilkul, bilkul, wohi toh ho gaya tha lekin jab plan lene se pehle aapne mere ko baar baar phone kiya na aapne Ashima madam ne baar baar main apne kaam karta hu maine kaha baad mein phone karna har do minute mein phone kar rahe ho aadhe ghante mein phone kar rahe ho aap woh mere ko kharab laga tha woh same cheez wohi.

Executive: Woh isliye woh isliye na sir aapka account band ho jata hai is wajah se aapko baar baar phone kar rahe hain.

Customer: Mera account tha na aapko kya problem hoti thi mera account tha woh aapko kya problem hoti thi.

Executive: Sir, account toh hamare paas hai na toh hamare paas register hai account account hamari hamari taraf se jayega na woh cheez hamara account band hoga hamari taraf hamara jo register account hai woh band hoga toh.

Customer: Main ab main aapse request karta hu aapko mail dal dijiye haan main haan main main mail dal dunga aapko baat kar please please nahi sir main aapko kitne din mein aap reply denge hum kitne din mein denge reply?

Executive: Eh main aapko kar eh 1:00 baje tak karu kyunki ma'am abhi jo hai meeting mein hai.

Customer: 3:00 baje tak kar do, mere ko 3:00 baje tak koi jawab nahi mila toh woh same cheez main 4:00 baje main phir email karunga aaj wapis.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai sir, koi baat nahi main discuss karke bataungi. Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer says he is not getting buyleads.

- Customer says he is wasting time.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the refund process.

- Executive asked for some time to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss and revert by 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, time
